verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will announce his decision on whether to keep the U.S. in the Iran nuclear deal on Tuesday . Trump is facing a self - imposed May 12 deadline over whether to uphold the 2015 nuclear deal , which he long has criticized] .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump says he [V: will] announce his decision on whether to keep the U.S. in the Iran nuclear deal on Tuesday . Trump is facing a self - imposed May 12 deadline over whether to uphold the 2015 nuclear deal , which he long has criticized .
